p: Welcome to the ComicUpdates API documentation. Our database includes comics from all over the world and notifications keep you current on new releases. The site supports English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish and more.
At this time, documentation is solely in English. But we aim to localized support for Chinese users soon. Other languages can use Google Translate in the meantime.
Free API access is granted with some conditions:
You need to credit ComicUpdates as the source.
You cannot have ads or paid services on your website and/or apps
Paid version offer expanded support and privileges:
You are not obligated to credit ComicUpdates
You can have ads or paid services on your website and/or apps

You're welcome to join the #dev-talk channel on our Discord server to ask technical questions. Please ensure to thoroughly review the documentation first to find answers on your own before asking. The channel sees high volume, so checking documentation first helps everyone.
If you believe you've discovered a security vulnerability, please contact us privately through:
A staff member on our Discord server
And please keep it in private until you get a response, there are always a lots of eyes watching our public discussion channels, and they will abuse the exploit as soon as they get hands on it.

If you find something that seems off during development or API use, please share details. But first double check on your end. When sure, tell us exactly how to repeat it and what the expected vs actual behavior is - that really helps track things down fast. Together we can make everything work better!

l: I found something missing/wrong in the documentation
p: We're always working to improve our documentation. Please let us know if you find any mistakes or missing information. Early versions may leave some details unclear on purpose. Feel free to ask us any questions - we're happy to help explain things better. Accurate docs help everyone, so feedback is much appreciated. Thanks!
A Image Cover for a manga *
In Manga attributes you have the links field that is a JSON object with some strange keys, here is how to decode this object:
Stored as full URL, untranslated stuff URL (original language)
Stored as full URL, official english licenced URL
A colored variant of this manga
A different version of this manga with no other specific distinction
A manga based on the same intellectual property as this manga
A manga taking place in the same fictional world as this manga
A monochrome variant of this manga
A self-published derivative work based on this manga
A side work contemporaneous with the narrative of this manga
An alternative take of the story in this manga
An official derivative work based on this manga
The next entry in the same series
The official serialization of this manga
The original narrative this manga is based on
The original version of this manga before its official serialization
The original work this self-published derivative manga is based on
The original work this spin-off manga has been adapted from
The previous entry in the same series
This data is used in the "related" field of a Manga relationships
This is the ComicUpdates API Changelog.
New --pro flag during retype start to enable trial mode of Retype Pro features, see #612
New start.pro: true project config to enable trial mode of Retype Pro features, see #612
Path independent doc_theme local storage variable, see #624
Not supported value WARNING on first build with new locale, see #573
html lang=\en\ attribute not updated if locale changes, see #574
Publish the API Docs to Github
